title: Criticism of the Western Civilization-Collection 61 (Gambling 2)
description:
Criticism of the Western Civilization - Collection 61 (Gambling 2):

We have 37 titles here:

-  Abbott et al - A Review of Research on Aspects of Problem Gambling, Auckland Univ. of Technology (2004)

-  Banks - Online Gambling and Crime; Causes, Controls and Controversies (2014)

-  Bashan & White - Gambling with Our Future; the Costs and Benefits of Legalized Gambling (2002)

-  Binde - Gambling Advertising; a Critical Research Review (2014)

-  Binde - What Are the Most Harmful Forms of Gambling; Analyzing Problem Gambling Prevalence Surveys (2011)

-  Cassidy et al - Fair Game; Producing Gambling Research, the Goldsmiths Report (2013)

-  Cheng - The Sociology of Gambling in China (2011)

-  Derevensky et al (Eds.) - Youth Gambling; the Hidden Addiction (2011)

-  Doiron - Gambling and Problem Gambling in Prince Edward Island (2006)

-  Gambling Impact Study, Spectrum Gaming Group (2013)

-  Gerstein et al - Gambling Impact and Behavior Study (1999)

-  Grant & Potenza (Eds.) - Pathological Gambling; a Clinical Guide to Treatment (2004)

-  Grinols - Gambling in America; Costs and Benefits (2004)

-  Hayward - The Costs and Benefits of Gaming; a Literature Review with Emphasis on Nova Scotia (2004)

-  Humphreys et al - The Effect of Gambling on Health; Evidence from Canada, U. of Alberta (Nov 2011)

-  Iorizzo - Straight Talk About.. Gambling (2013)

-  Isaacs - You Bet Your Life; the Burdens of Gambling (2001)

-  Kearney - The Economic Winners and Losers of Legalized Gambling (Feb 2005)

-  McComb & Hanson - Problem Gambling on College Campuses, NASPA Journal (2009)

-  McCown & Howatt - Treating Gambling Problems (2007)

-  McMillen (Ed.) - Gambling Cultures; Studies in History and Interpretation (1996)

-  Mutari & Figart - Just One More Hand; Life in the Casino Economy (2015)

-  Orford et al - Gambling and Problem Gambling in Britain (2003)

-  Problem Gambling and Harm; Towards a National Definition, The SA Centre for Economic Studies (2005)

-  Raymer - Lay the Favorite; a Memoir of Gambling (2010)

-  Reith - The Age of Chance; Gambling in Western Culture (1999)

-  Rickwood et al - The Psychology of Gambling; APS Review Paper (Nov 2010)

-  Seniors and Gambling, a Hidden Problem; a Report on the Seniors and Gambling Project, Nova Scotia (March 2010)

-  Shaffer et al (Eds.) - Futures at Stake; Youth, Gambling, and Society (2003)

-  Skolnik - High Stakes; the Rising Cost of America's Gambling Addiction (2011)

-  Snowdon - The Crack Cocaine of Gambling; Gambling Machines in the UK (April 2013)

-  Social and Economic Impact Study of Gambling in Tasmania (2011)

-  Sojourner - She Bets Her Life; a True Story of Gambling Addiction (2010)

-  Spapens et al (Eds.) - Crime, Addiction and the Regulation of Gambling (2008)

-  The Costs and Consequences of Gambling in the State of Delaware, U. of Delaware (Oct 2002)

-  Thompson - The International Encyclopedia of Gambling,  Vols. 1 & 2 (2010)

-  Ugel - Money for Nothing; One Man's Journey Through the Dark Side of Lottery Millions (2007)
